Node.definition: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= action by which humans pass on information to someone else, having been commissioned to do so by a deity or another person

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

Node.gloss: to hold a festival|to hold a feast
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans hold a celebration, usually of a religious nature, involving animal sacrifices; ≈ associated with joy
= celebration, usually of a religious nature; ≈ associated with joy
= action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity
= process by which an action is repeated or continued

possible literal meaning: without benefit or without success; hence: = state in which someone is considered an objectional human being who is engaged in evil behavior and does not contribute to the society in a positive way
literally: to cut off; hence: = causative process by which a certain category of people or animals are removed from a particular group

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time
= construction or set of constructions in the shape of walls, ramparts, and towers; ► erected in order to make a town better defendable against attack or siege
= action by which humans watch and wait attentively and anxiously for something to happen

= an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives
literally: to strengthen (one's) loins; hence: = action by which humans show themselves mentally strong and able to handle dangerous situations

= the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength
= process by which humans summon their physical strength to accomplish a particular goal
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
literally: to bring back (something into its former state); hence: = causative action by which humans restore an object to its original state
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= to act forcibly on something, ► so as to cause it to become waste and/or desolate
= someone who acts forcibly on others, ► so as to lay them waste and make them desolate
= part of a vine (גֶּפֶן) which grows out of the trunk or a bough

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= causative action by which humans give an object a red color, ◄ either by painting or dying

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
meaning unsure; possibly: = hard and shining metal; ◄ alloy of iron and carbon; ► used for making tools and weapons|meaning unsure; possibly: = cloth that covers another object
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: to prepare|to make ready|to make provisions (for something)
Node.definition: = causative action where humans or deities make objects ready for use

exact meaning unsure: = one of the evergreen trees commonly found in the Lebanon, with round leaves rather than flat; its fruit is a a mostly inedible seed bearing, fleshy cone; ≈ regarded as one of the glorious trees of the Lebanon
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare

Node.gloss: to rage|to charge madly|to dash wildly
Node.definition: = action by which vehicles move at a larger speed than is considered responsible, ≈ which is associated with insane behavior
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= process by which vehicles move at great speed without an apparent destination
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads
= the part of an object that can be seen with the eye
= piece of wood burning on one end; ► used to provide light or as a means of igniting something else; ≈ associated with light and destruction
= process by which bright flashes of light are seen between clouds and the ground or within clouds, often accompanied by thunder; ≈ regarded as fire from heaven and arrows or spears from God

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= person in a position of leadership, either within the community or within the army
= process by which humans trip or temporarily lose their balance when walking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote failure
= action by which humans move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= action by which humans or animals move quickly

= structure surrounding a building, a collection of buildings, or a town; ◄ made out of stone; ► provides protection; ≈ associated with strength, safety, and the ability to resist attacks from outside
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an object to be firmly located in a certain place

= a large protective shield used for covering the soldiers who operated a battering ram, who were exposed to attack from above by the defenders of the city; sometimes the mantelet was part of the mechanism that carried the battering ram; sometimes it was formed by other soldiers who overlapped individual shields above their heads
= a flowing body of water, but here referring to a specific river or rivers

= causative action by which humans or deities allow others entrance, passage, or access (in)to a building, construction, or area ◄ by withdrawing a gate, door, window, lid, covering, or other boundary; ≈ sometimes associated with freedom, sometimes with being exposed, vulnerable
= a building or set of buildings, distinguished from other constructions or houses by its magnificence ► and function, which is either religious or political
literally: to melt; hence: = process by which a relatively hard object becomes soft and collapses
= action by which deities come to a formal and authoritative decision about something and enforce it

Node.gloss: to uncover (part of someone's) body|to take captive
Node.definition: = causative action by which someone causes someone else to take off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which brings shame on that person and to those who stand in a close relation to them|= causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans or objects to go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot or carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

= the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= town; ◄ located in northern Mesopotamia near Mosul on the east bank of the Tigris (חִדֶּקֶל) ► built by Nimrod (נִמְרֹד) after the flood (מַבּוּל) ancient capital of Assyria (אַשּׁוּר) preached against by the prophet Jonah (יֹונָה)
= relatively large reservoir ◄ dug by human hands ► to collect water; place where many public activities take place
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which someone takes all sorts of goods (including people and animals) by force from an enemy in war
= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= action by which someone takes all sorts of goods (including people and animals) by force from an enemy in war
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= material possessions such as gold, silver, animals and slaves; ► usually results in a position of honor and power
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes
= state in which objects have such a high quality ► that they provoke in others the desire to possess them
exact meaning unsure; probably: = state of total desolation as a result of destruction
exact meaning unsure; probably: = state of total desolation as a result of destruction
exact meaning unsure; probably: = state of having been totally destroyed
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= process by which substances become soft, ◄ often as a result of a higher temperature
= state of moving unsteadily from side to side
= central area of the leg where the thigh is joined to the lower leg; ≈ associated with stability and strength
= state of strong fear and distress, compared to the state of mind of a woman in labor; ► often accompanied by physical side effects, like writhing and trembling

= the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength
= process by which people have a reduced blood flow in the skin causing a lighter complexion, ◄ as a result of fear
= reddish glow on one's face; ≈ associated with health and well being
= a reference to an unknown location, but focused on the question whether an object actually exists at all, rather than with a specific location in mind

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and strength
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a young male lion (אֲרִי) ≈ regarded as fierce and dangerous
= open land with enough grass and plants to graze cattle or flocks of sheep and goats
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect
= offspring of wild, carnivorous mammals

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= causative action by which humans inspire a strong fear in (other) humans or animals, ► resulting in panic

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

Node.gloss: to tear to pieces|to maul|to mangle
Node.definition: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness
= state of being sufficient in quantity for a given purpose
= offspring of wild, carnivorous mammals
= causative action by which animals kill other living creatures ◄ by cutting off their air supply

= female of the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect
= causative action by which someone causes a certain location, container, or surface to be filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left
literally: what is torn apart; hence: = slain victim of a carnivorous animal; ≈ associated with a violent death, bloodshed, and frequently used as a metaphor for victims of warfare
= empty, open place ◄ in a solid body
literally: what is torn apart; hence: = slain victim of a carnivorous animal; ≈ associated with a violent death, bloodshed, and frequently used as a metaphor for victims of warfare
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: YHWH (or one of the other names of God of a combination thereof) of Hosts; hence: = epithet of God with focus on his being in charge of the host of heavenly beings surrounding his throne, praising him, and carrying out his will in earth; ≈ as an epithet it relates to God's power and control of the cosmos as the divine king and warrior
= action by which someone causes something else to be harmed or destroyed by fire
= a group of chariots (מֶרְכָּבָה) usually owned by one single person
= a young male lion (אֲרִי) ≈ regarded as fierce and dangerous
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
literally: to cut off; hence: = causative process by which a certain category of people or animals are removed from a particular group

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: what is torn apart; hence: = slain victim of a carnivorous animal; ≈ associated with a violent death, bloodshed, and frequently used as a metaphor for victims of warfare
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else
